The rune javelin is a type of members ranged ammunition used by ballistae. They are the third strongest type of javelin, surpassed only by the amethyst javelin and dragon javelin.

They can be fletched by attaching rune javelin heads to javelin shafts at level 77 Fletching, granting 187.5 experience per 15 javelins made. They can also be obtained by buying them from the Ranging Guild, the Void Knight Archery Store or from Oobapohk's Javelin Store after Monkey Madness II.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
31 October 2016
 Hotfix

The Ranged Strength bonus of rune javelins has been decreased from +145 to +124.[1]

6 May 2016
(update)
  • Rune javelins are no longer equippable in the Weapon slot, now being equippable in the Ammunition slot as ammo for ballistae.
  • The Ranged Attack bonus has been removed; previously, it was +38.
  • The Ranged Strength bonus has increased from +42 to +145.
22 August 2006
(update)
  • The extra strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Rune javelin(+)" to "Rune javelin(p+)".
  • The super strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Rune javelin(s)" to "Rune javelin(p++)".
29 March 2004
(update)

The item became permanently available with the launch of RuneScape 2.

21 January 2004
(update)

The item became obtainable in the RuneScape 2 Beta.

1 December 2003
(update)

The item was added to the RuneScape 2 Beta cache.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The High Level Alchemy value of the finished rune javelin (240 gp) is much lower than that of rune javelin heads (810 gp)

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Mod Archie. "Ballista/Javelin Stat Changes." October 31, 2016. Old School Announcements Forums.
